properties.entry: SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#selectAllRoomList(); */ A.ROOM_NO , A.ROOM_PRICE , A.EXCLUSIVE_AREA , A.ADDRESS , A.ROOM_FLOOR , A.ROOM_TITLE , B.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ROOM A JOIN TBL_ROOM_FILE B ON (A.ROOM_NO = B.ROOM_NO) WHERE A.ROOM_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.FILE_NO = 1 AND (A.CATEGORY_NO = ?) ORDER BY A.ROOM_NO DESC
UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#incrementRoomCount(); */ TBL_ROOM A SET A.VIEW_NO = (SELECT B.VIEW_NO FROM TBL_ROOM B WHERE ROOM_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.ROOM_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#selectRoomDetail() */ A.ROOM_NO , A.ROOM_PRICE , A.EXCLUSIVE_AREA , A.ADDRESS , TRUNC(SYSDATE - A.CREATE_DATE) AS CREATE_DATE , A.CATEGORY_NO , B.CATEGORY_NAME , A.OFFICE_NO , C.OFFICE_NAME , C.OFFICE_ADDR , C.OFFICE_PHONE , C.BUSINESS_NO , C.OFFICE_RATING , C.USER_NO , D.NICKNAME , A.ROOM_FLOOR , A.DIRECTION , A.MONTH_COST , A.ELECTRICITY_YN , A.GAS_YN , A.WATER_YN , A.INTERNET_YN , A.TV_YN , TO_CHAR(A.CONSTRUCTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CONSTRUCTION_DATE , A.AVAILABLE_DATE , A.ROOM_TITLE , A.ROOM_EXPLANATION , A.TRANSPORTATION_INFO , A.WASHING_MACHINE_YN , A.REFRIGERATOR_YN , A.AIR_CONDITIONER_YN , A.GAS_STOVE_YN , A.PET_YN , A.ELEVATOR_YN , A.PARKING_YN , A.VIEW_NO , E.FILE_NO , E.ORIGIN_NAME , E.SAVE_NAME , E.SAVE_PATH , E.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ROOM A JOIN TBL_ROOM_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TBL_OFFICE C ON (A.OFFICE_NO = C.OFFICE_NO) JOIN TBL_USER D ON (C.USER_NO = D.USER_NO) JOIN TBL_ROOM_FILE E ON (A.ROOM_NO = E.ROOM_NO) WHERE A.ROOM_NO = ? AND D.USER_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#selectOfficeNo() */ A.OFFICE_NO FROM TBL_OFFICE A JOIN TBL_USER B ON (A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE B.USER_NO = ?

INSERT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#insertRoom() */ INTO TBL_ROOM A ( ROOM_NO , ROOM_PRICE , EXCLUSIVE_AREA , ADDRESS , CATEGORY_NO , OFFICE_NO , ROOM_FLOOR , DIRECTION , MONTH_COST , ELECTRICITY_YN , GAS_YN , WATER_YN , INTERNET_YN , TV_YN , CONSTRUCTION_DATE , AVAILABLE_DATE , ROOM_TITLE , ROOM_EXPLANATION , TRANSPORTATION_INFO , WASHING_MACHINE_YN , REFRIGERATOR_YN , AIR_CONDITIONER_YN , GAS_STOVE_YN , PET_YN , ELEVATOR_YN , PARKING_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_ROOM_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TBL_ROOM_FILE A ( ROOM_NO , FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , SAVE_NAME , SAVE_PATH , THUMBNAIL_PATH ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
